definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: lamb (As. immeru (also = child; immertu, girl; conj. as to etym. Dl:Prol. 28 Jen:ZMG xiiii (1889), 203; ZA vii. 216 Schwally:Idiot. 114), Targum [[אמריא]]; Syr. 0emro0, Pun. [[אמר]], Palm. pl. emph. [[אמריא]] Lzb:220 Cooke:Inscr. 120. 337; Ar. 0’amara (loan-word ? cf. Frä:107, but also DHM:VOJ i. 24));—pl. [[אִמְּרִין]], lambs, as sacrif. victims Ezr 6:9, Ezr 6:17, Ezr 7:17.
